name: The Villa: Allison's Diary
description: A villa, a daily routine and an apparently happy family. Here is where everything began. Relive through flashbacks, immersive cinematic effects and terrifying jump scares, the night Allison killed her parents in 1956.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7-7700 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
